title.narrative: Update the ECO Risk profile & Risk Library in accordance with the revised guidelines by end May 2015

actual.value: 2020:2020 Annual Risk registration is to start following the eGRC platform user training that was provided by DFAM in June 2020.

title.narrative: Harmonize ECO Business Continuity Plan with UNECA

actual.value: 2020:OMT decided not to pursue previous plan of common alternate site for all UN agencies. It is too complex and expensive to manage one alternate site for over 600 critical staff from all UN agencies in Addis Ababa. Instead, based on UNCT decision, each agency will prepare and follow their agency-wise B
